title: rioter please help
body: alright. i have absolutely no idea how but this player on the opposing team just said my real password in all chat at the beginning of the game. MY REAL PASSWORD! i reported him for cheating(using third party applications). rioter please help me if you want to check its the teemo on the other team the only person i have reported for cheating in the last week.

replies.body:
The very important follow up questions here:
1. Have you updated your password?
2. Have you updated the password of your email address?
3. Have you checked your computer for any virus, trojan, malware, keylogger?

also id like to add i have never ever met this teemo before this match. he said my password at the beginning of the game. i dont think i have trojans on my computer so he must be using a program to check or something
This is by far the scariest thing I've heard go around. Jesus Christ. Hope you get it sorted man!
Go report it to support then.

Hi fum422, just wanted to say that we've looked into this and taken the necessary action.

As long as you've changed your password your account should be safe. Make sure to stay away from those free RP scams and keep your computer virus free as well.
